nodes.message: Lets get the closest position to Shawn "top" or "bottom" are the valid results from the invoke command.

nodes.text: I think this rope is as secure as it's going to get.
Well, now I know this makes a good stalagmite for grappling.
I might be able to use this stalgamite with a grapnel.
I'll just fasten this around here...
And it's just a short climb to the top...
If I had a rope and grapnel with me, that would probably be a fine idea.
... almost fell! That could've been ugly!

nodes.message: Climbing down should require no skill check.

nodes.text: Well, now I want this back.
